about_the_game:
This demo is designed to give you a taste of what a typical day on the job is like. You'll have a chance to go through a single shift on the job, working your way through 7 passengers and their accompanying luggage. Can you stay focused? Or will you black out on the job? Give it a shot and find out if you've got what it takes, your first day is free during recruiting season! We'll really take anyone we can get...

This demo stocks you up with a top of the line Bagotron luggage scanner, a full sized passenger scanner, a hand held Objectofinder (to help locate contraband on passengers), and a reversible double sided switch-face dual usage stamp. You'll have less than a minute per passenger to locate and eradicate all contraband on their person and in their bags. The timer decreases with each passenger, but don't worry, you'll get the hang of it.

And that's it! Get out there and keep the skies safe, agent! And remember, stay frisky.

name: TSA Frisky VR Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You are a TSA agent with the daunting task of surviving your shift. Manage lines, luggage, and leisure, to keep from blacking out on the job. Use your tools effectively to score more points and get on the global leader boards* *leader boards coming soon
